summary:
Arcania is Arcadias daugther.
She was caught by bandits.
Can you free her and find her secrets?
descriptionHtml:
[b]IMPORTANT INFO! VERSION 2.1!!![/b]
- Fixed a dialogue for Arcania

[b]IMPORTANT INFO! VERSION 2.0!!![/b]
An update from older versions than 2.0 is not possible.
Please uninstall Arcania first, do a clean savegame, and install Version 2.0 then.

[b]VERSION 2.0 major update[/b]
- Added fully voiced custom dialogues.
- Removed some glitches from older versions
- Added more locations
- Moved Arcanias house next to Whiterun Stables
- Better NPC's AIPackages
- New music added
- And much more!!!

[b]VERSION 1.3 bugfix![/b]
In version 1.2 I messed up the merchants and innkeeper factions.
That's fixed in v1.3!
Its ok just to replace the Arcania.esp file.
That should also work in an already running game.


[b]HOW THE MOD GETS STARTED[/b]
The mod informs you with a little message, that Arcania has been initialized successfully, when you installed it correctly.

Sometimes this can take up to 1 minute! And it only appears once!



[b]Arcania is Arcadias daughter and usually lives in her own house next to Whiterun Stables.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/38378-1-1373912085.png[/img]

Few time ago she has been caught by a group of bandits.

They locked her inside her own cellar and put the key into her chest.

The chest and also the cell door are well protected against stealing, so the real key is needed to find the good way to save Arcania.

Arcadia cannot help her, because the bandits would kill her and her daughter.

So, Arcania sits in her cell and waits for her rescue.

She managed to write a letter and gave it to her mother with the favor to bring it to the next available courier.

So here is, where your quest starts:

A courier will find you and bring you this letter.

Please follow the steps very carefully, otherwise Arcania will be in serious trouble.

Perhaps also Arcadia has a hint for you?

When you managed to free her, she will follow you everywhere and is also willed to become your spouse.[/b]

[b]What is added to your game?[/b]
- Many new locations: Arcanias Cellar, Arcanias Prison, A Tavern, etc...
- few new NPC (Arcania, and a few others ;-) Just find them...)
- 2 quests

All NPC have their own AI!
[b]Arcania's AI:[/b]
- While sits in her cell: Wander around, hang out, sleep, sit...
- When she's free: Helps her mother, walk over Whiteruns market, visit the Bannered Mare...

[b]AI added to Arcadia:[/b]
- She visits the Bannered Mare now. Between 8pm and 00am
- She also acts in a quest.

[b]Other things changed:[/b]
- Arcadias outfit changed

[b]Load order:[/b]
- Normally the load order doesn't really matter.
Important is: When you have any mod, what affects Arcadias Cauldron, please put it [i]before[/i] Arcania.esp otherwise Arcadias AI may be incomplete / extra furniture inside Arcadias Cauldron could be missing / an important door could be missing.

[b]Installation:[/b]
- Simply extract the Archive to your Skyrim DATA/ directory.

[b]De-installation:[/b]
- Remove: Data/Arcania.esp, DataArcania.bsa

[b]Upgrading from my old Arcania Mod:[/b]
- Make sure, you got all items back, Arcania has kept for you
- Save a game [i]inside[/i] Breezehome or another building (Except Arcadias Cauldron)
- Remove all old Arcania related files
- Start your game, load your savegame, store a new savegame
- Install the new Arcania mod

[b]Credits:[/b]
- Arcania, Quest, other new NPCs have been created by myself.
- Arcania uses a hairset from ApachiiSky hair. (With given permission)
- The mod contains 4 soundtracks from Malukah: (With given permission)
-[i]Age Of Opression[/i]
-[i]Tale Of The Tongues[/i]
-[i]The Age Of Agression[/i]
-[i]The Dragonborn Comes[/i]
- The mod contains one new soundtrack:

[b][i]Eltari - an Elvensong
Music&Production: Alex Papachristos
Voice: Jade Ardela[/i][/b]

- The mod uses voiced custom dialogues:

[b][i]Arcadia's custom dialogues were spoken by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4265385-sekireigan/]Sekireigan & Lux[/url]
Arcania's custom dialogues were spoken by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4588115-dragonrose32/]Dragonrose32[/url][/i][/b]


[youtube]e3OrUNefNNs[/youtube]

So long, and sorry for my bad English ;-)

Das Mod ist auch auf Deutsch erhältlich! In den Files findet Ihr die Deutschen Dateien.
Sprachausgabe ist dort allerdings Englisch. Vielleicht gibt es in einer nächsten Version auch
Deutsche Sprachausgabe? Meldet Euch bei mir, wenn Ihr mich dabei unterstützen möchtet.

[b]French translation done by fletch2099 is available here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54141/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54141/[/url][/b]
author: Devilmarkus
